post_content: Here are some other pictures maybe someone can tell if real under blacklight
The  fact alone that there is a wagner there with that pristine of condition automatically has me believing that is and the others are all reprints.
Hard to tell via photo, but they look like they are shining bright white which would lead me to believe they are some sort of reproduction and not original.
Here's a pic - the Doyle Nat'l is a reprint.  The Donovan is authentic.  See how the Doyle is bright - the Donovan is dull - again this is hard to see via photo, but is pretty obvious in person.
Yeah the fact that there's a Wagner in this group is proof enough that they are a recent reprint set of some sort.

[quote name="Cory" post=2495371]Here's a pic - the Doyle Nat'l is a reprint.  The Donovan is authentic.  See how the Doyle is bright - the Donovan is dull - again this is hard to see via photo, but is pretty obvious in person.[/QUOTE]

Well these sure don't glow like that one I your pic

[quote name="Cory" post=2495371]Here's a pic - the Doyle Nat'l is a reprint.  The Donovan is authentic.  See how the Doyle is bright - the Donovan is dull - again this is hard to see via photo, but is pretty obvious in person.[/QUOTE]

The light is directly over the fake

[quote name="Luke" post=2495382]Yeah the fact that there's a Wagner in this group is proof enough that they are a recent reprint set of some sort.[/QUOTE]


+1 

That tiny remaining amount of benefit of the doubt has been obliterated.
If these were the better pictures I'd hate to see the orginal grouping.  Oh yeah, they are fake.
Think these are fake as well?
The T3 Brown looks okay but without feeling in hand its hard to be 100%, and a faker would not likely not write on the card as it limits the value and if submitted to PSA would get a qualifier.

Lol. Gotcha!

+100
LOL
Great work!!!
People (scammers!) often forget that there are a wealth of tools to track down cards especially when bought off eBay...smh

If I had a Wagner and those other HOFers I would not ask net54 if they were real after I acquired them unless I was waiting to get them back from PSA or SGC

The mere fact the question was posed coupled with the horrible scans immediately raised major red flags
